About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

My name is Mohanapriya, and I'm a Web Developer currently living in Nottingham, UK. I'm a passionate and ambitious developer, who wants to help companies grow through the use of novel and innovative technologies, particularly using front-end tech like JavaScript and jQuery. While I love development and design, I'm also comfortable using back-end tech including NodeJS, and MongoDB. Outside of web development, I enjoy learning about Animation, playing games, watching an irresponsible amount of youtube, and consuming an even more good and healthy food

Junior Web Developer

  • Knowledge of JavaScript libraries such as Handlebars and parse JSON data with Handlebars
  • Understanding of jQuery and practiced minimizing the JS using jQuery
  • Knowledge of responsive design using HTML5 and CSS3 in developing content for the modern web
